http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1634122/

It's always so entertaining to see some assclown bitching about the quality problems of a 700mb file. If you want quality go DL a 1080p full BRrip at 6-8gigs. As has been said, not everyone has unlimited bandwidth, and even then not everyone has the DL speed to actually get a file that size in a couple hours. Most really decent speeds will be something around 500kbps, which means it'll take longer to DL the movie than it will to actually watch the stupid thing. 

In short, if you want super awesome quality, go buy the BR for 30$+ at walmart, and quit pissing and moaning about something like this...
